## Design of Efficient Algorithms

### Introduction

This module deals with the design of efficient algorithms.


### Contents

Architecture and implementation of formal systems for developing efficient algorithms, correctness-preserving optimisation, programme verification and synthesis.


### Learning Objectives

Students will be familiar with and understand basic techniques of formal programme development and its implementation.


### Examination Methods

- Either a 90-minute written exam.
- Or a 30 minute oral examination.
